Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: At HockeyBet, we take the protection of your personal data very seriously. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
Privacy.section1Content: We collect the information you provide during registration: username, email address, and password. This data is necessary to create and manage your account.
Privacy.section2Content: Your data is used solely to provide our services: account management, participation in betting groups, and improving your user experience.
Privacy.section3Content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, modification, disclosure, or destruction.
Privacy.section4Content: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your personal data at any time. To exercise these rights, contact us.
Privacy.section5Content: We use cookies to improve your experience on our site. You can configure your browser to refuse cookies if you wish.
